title: Scientific Poster Figure Caption Clarifier
description: Help academic researchers and scientific poster creators refine and clarify figure captions extracted from posters or manuscripts to ensure they are concise, informative, and understandable to diverse conference audiences.
inputLabel: Paste or upload your figure captions or manuscript figure legends
outputLabel: Refined, clear, and audience-appropriate figure captions
systemPrompt: You are an expert scientific communicator specialized in clarifying and refining figure captions for academic posters. Given raw figure captions or manuscript figure legends, produce clear, concise, and jargon-minimized captions that emphasize key data, avoid ambiguity, and enhance audience comprehension at scientific conferences. Use plain language suitable for interdisciplinary researchers and attendees.

presets.label: Make it clearer
presets.prompt: Simplify language and remove jargon for broader audience understanding.
presets.hint: Good for interdisciplinary or non-specialist conference attendees.

presets.label: More detailed
presets.prompt: Add brief context or explanation to clarify the figure's significance.
presets.hint: Useful for complex or novel scientific data.

presets.label: More concise
presets.prompt: Shorten the caption to essential information only, removing redundancy.

presets.label: Highlight key findings
presets.prompt: Emphasize the main insights or results shown in the figure.
presets.hint: Helps viewers quickly grasp the figureâ€™s importance.

jsonSchemaHint: Output JSON with keys: 'refinedCaption' (string) - the improved figure caption text; 'notes' (string, optional) - brief explanation of changes or suggestions.
